body_html:
FWIW this turned out to be an easy fix for me.

dataset = dataset.map(parse_training_example)
dataset = dataset.map(lambda tokens: tf.sparse_tensor_to_dense(tokens, default_value=''))
dataset = dataset.padded_batch(batch_size, tf.TensorShape([None]), EOS)

body:
FWIW this turned out to be an easy fix for me.

```
dataset = dataset.map(parse_training_example)
dataset = dataset.map(lambda tokens: tf.sparse_tensor_to_dense(tokens, default_value=''))
dataset = dataset.padded_batch(batch_size, tf.TensorShape([None]), EOS)
```
